## keepHeaderComment() function

Put the first multi-line comment at the start of the output chunk before the import statements, if pattern is provided, find the first comment that matches the pattern.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function keepHeaderComment(options?: {
    sourcemap?: boolean;
    pattern?: RegExp;
}): OutputPlugin;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { sourcemap?: boolean; pattern?: RegExp; } | _(Optional)_ Options to configure plugin |

**Returns:**

OutputPlugin

## Example

Config rollup

```js
import clear from "rollup-plugin-clear";
import json from "@rollup/plugin-json";
import nodeResolve from "@rollup/plugin-node-resolve";
import commonjs from "@rollup/plugin-commonjs";
import typescript from "rollup-plugin-typescript2";
import dts from "rollup-plugin-dts";
import keepHeaderComment from "rollup-plugin-keep-header-comment";

export default {
  plugins: [
    clear({targets: ["dist"]}),
    json(),
    nodeResolve({preferBuiltins: false}),
    commonjs(),
    typescript({tsconfig}),
    dts({tsconfig}),
    keepHeaderComment({
        sourcemap: true,
        pattern: /@packageDocumentation/
    })
  ]
}
```
